Name: Rhythm Brawl
About the game: Ever wanted to compete against your friend in a rhythm game? Well now you can! Rhythm Brawl allows you have a battle of rhythm against a human or computer opponent to see who becomes 'The King of Rhythm'. Will you be the King? Play and Find out! It contains vertical-scrolling rhythm gameplay which is most notably found in games like Guitar Hero, but in multiplayer. But that's not all that it offers! There are certain mechanics in place which spice things up by adding little intricacies, making each round slightly different from the previous. Moreover, it has a roster of 6 characters with different stats, providing interesting mixups. The game can be played against other players or the AI. Rhythm Brawl is a 'Battle Of The Bands' that takes place between two of musicians who will sync and play to a specific song. Each musician has their own backstories and goals behind their play and the songs will speak out their intent for them. Each musician has a personal rival which they want to beat in a Rhythm Brawl. Rhythm Brawl takes place bi-annually throughout the Japanese town of Rizumia(Rhythmia), a man-made island for the elite class. Rizumians(People of Rhythmia) are musical fans who host the competition. The Features Of Rhythm Brawl :- Vertical Scrolling Rhythm Gameplay. 2-5 Minute Long Battles. Local Multiplayer. AI Battles. Special Notes, AMP Meters and Flow States. (TBA) 6 characters, each with their own playstyle. Many different songs from different music genres.
Developers: Mahad Dareshani,Eren Ozdemir,Spad3s,Meister D Mysterium Mysterium
